summary: A craftable Battleaxe that vaguely resembles a popular god's weapon from another era.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Huge thanks to[/size][b] [size=5]trevonr2[/size] [/b][size=4]for the time and guidance when creating the 2nd version of this mod.[/size]

[size=4]Thanks to [b]Chaos_Hellfire ([/b][url=https://www.youtube.com/user/ChaosHellfire/videos]Ikari[/url]) for featuring the v1.1 of this mod for his [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8sAbTDyN9aI]Skyrim Mods and More[/url] series.[/size]



[size=4]This mod is an amalgamation of the Dwarven War Axe and Restoration staff which uses custom textures.[/size]
﻿[size=4]
Credits to [/size][b][size=4]darkman24[/size][/b][size=4] for his wonderful[/size][size=5] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30998]Dwemer bronze and steel - Dwarven weapons recolor[/url][/size][size=4] mod.


*New in [b]V2:[/b]

﻿- New models and added textures

﻿- Increased weapon speed

[b]V2 Note[/b]: No more long 1-handed variant included.


[b]

Stormcaller[/b] is a 2-handed Battleaxe craftable at the forge along with its 1-handed version, called [b]Stormchaser.

For v1.1: Stormchaser [/b]comes in 2 variants: A small one which is the default model, and a long-handled, medium size one which is an optional model replacer for the 1-handed axe.


[b]

Stormcaller[/b] Stats:

Attack: 35
Crit Damage: 50
Weight: 29
Value: 3000

[b]Stormcaller[/b] Recipe:

Fire Salts = 5
Taproot = 5
Firewood = 4
Ebony Ingot = 2
Dwarven Metal Ingot = 3
Quicksilver Ingot = 3
[/size]
[b][size=3]This needs 2 Dwarven Metal Ingots for upgrading.[/size][/b]

[i]The skill/perk requirements for crafting the weapon and upgrading/tempering it are the same as the Dwarven Battleaxe.[/i]


[size=4][b]




Stormchaser[/b] Stats:

Attack: 21
Crit Damage: 25
Weight: 16
Value: 800

[b][b]Stormchaser[/b][/b] Recipe:

Fire Salts = 3
Taproot = 3
Firewood = 2
Ebony Ingot = 1
Dwarven Metal Ingot = 1
Quicksilver Ingot = 2[/size]


[b][size=3]This needs 1 Dwarven Metal Ingot for upgrading.[/size][/b]

[i]The skill/perk requirements for crafting the 1-handed weapon and upgrading/tempering it are the same as the Dwarven War Axe.[/i]




[size=4]You can try the following mods to increase your options of personalizing your crafted weapon:


[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80918]Summermyst - Enchantments of Skyrim[/url][b]﻿ - [/b]for more enchantment variety

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56614/]Enchanted Arsenal[/url]﻿ - for custom weapon visual effects.[/size]




[i][size=1]"[i][size=1]Yushhuhuv... [/size][/i]Yhhu... You should have gone for the head."





[/size][/i]My other mods:


[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92118][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/10838763-1530264673.png[/img][/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92222][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/10838763-1530267020.png[/img][/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92285][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92285/92285-1530553726-649391902.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92663][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92663/92663-1532268686-1165311428.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92767][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/10838763-1532839364.png[/img][/url]
author: Vilidran and trevonr2

files.name: Stormcaller Standalone v1.1
files.changelogHtml:
- Rotated the grip to fix the noticeable seam in first person view especially when the weapon is enchanted
- Reduced the size of the Axe-head (thanks to trevonr2)
- Brightened the texture of the hammer/blunt side of the weapon
- Now craftable at the forge
- 1-handed variants added
